Return the {@link CacheResolver} bean to use to resolve exception caches for_annotation-driven cache management. Implementations must explicitly declare_{@link org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean @Bean}, e.g._
_@_Configuration_@_EnableCaching_public class AppConfig implements JCacheConfigurer {_@_Bean // important!_@_Override_public CacheResolver exceptionCacheResolver() {_// configure and return CacheResolver instance__// ...__
_See {@link org.springframework.cache.annotation.EnableCaching} for more complete examples.
